'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a consumable item that is needed to feed [[Pet|pets]] of the type [[Horse]]. 

=Acquisition=
{{PAGENAME}} can be bought in the :Paws: Menagerie of the [[Shop]] for 1 :Gem: with the commande <code>/buy_{{#show: {{PAGENAME}}| ?ItemID}}</code> or can be possible loot for succesful [[Foray|forays]]. {{PAGENAME}} can also be traded in the exchange with <code>/t_{{#show: {{PAGENAME}}| ?ItemID}}</code>
